title: Bloomberg Markets: Dewey Remembers Black Monday
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dewey Remembers Black Monday
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Richard Dewey\u0010Founder of Entropic \u0010Freelance contributor to Bloomberg Markets Magazine \u0010Discussing his oral history of the 30th anniversary of the stock market collapse of Oct. 19, 1987.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
